responses.title: Looks like I've got some new stories to tell.
The King has arrived.
A new journey is about to begin.
I need no introduction!
The King has arrived.
Time to pick a fight.
Everyone can relax; the Monkey King has arrived.
Oh, there'll be stories about this fight.
Hmhmhmm. This should be interesting.
I've been waiting for a challenge.
I've outwitted gods. Smashing a glowing rock should be no problem.
Hope they put up a decent fight.
None can stand against Sun Wukong.
These guys aren't gonna know what hit them.
My next great challenge will be your last.
A new journey is about to begin.
I need no introduction!
Equal of Heaven, greater than gods.
Perhaps a challenge at last.
The Monkey King.
Monkey King.
Sun Wukong.
These fools won't know what hit 'em.
I know all the tales.
This story's as good as written.
My greatest triumph is yet to come.
My greatest triumph is yet to come.
I travelled a long way to get here.
I travelled a long way to get here.
Don't look so surprised, human. My arrival was foretold.
Looks like I've got some new stories to tell.
It was in the bag the moment I walked on the battlefield.
This one is in the bag.
Try to keep up.
Follow me, and see how it's done..
Where I go, an army follows.
Time to move.
Let's go.
Where to?
Lets move.
Ok.
On it.
I'm ready.
On the move.
Yes.
Eh.
Right.
Very well.
Mmhm.
Yes.
Yes.
Yeah.
Yeah.
Ok.
Got it.
M'hm.
Yes.
Yes.
Yes.
M'hm!
Come on!
Of course.
Ha! It's what I do.
Count on it.
Keep it coming.
Who's next?!
Hu-wah!
Huwuh!
Ha!
Hu!
Hyuh!
Hrh!
Ha!
Ohf!
Huh!
Dah!
Urah!
Hyah!
Ha!
They're gonna be telling stories about this.
Man, I make this look good.
It ends here!
So long!
It's over!
Hard to run with a broken spine.
No!
No!
Uh, no.
No!
I'm just getting started.
I'll fight anyone that gets in my way.
I'm not stopping now.
I'll show them why I'm called 'King'.
Not even the Gods could stop me!
You thought I was trouble before?
Let's pick a fight.
In fine form.
I've killed better.
I could do this all day!
Aw come on, you're dead already?
Really? That's your best?
Barely broke a sweat.
I was expecting competition.
Come back after you've had some practice!
Another one down!
Nice try.
Only way that could've gone.
Oh, next time, try not to die.
Hm hm hm hm hmm.
Hohohohoo.
Huhahahahahahahahaaa.
Hnhnhnhnhnhnhnn.
Ooh ha ha ha haa ah ha ha.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ho ho ho hoo oh.
Ooo ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Oh ho ho ho ho hoo.
Ha ha ha.
Hoo oh oh oh.
Hehehehehe.
Hohohohohoho.
Huhahahahahahaha.
Hohohoho.
Oh ho hooo.
You should've stayed home, Apparition. You're not walking away from this.
Alright fishbowl head, show me what you've got.
Axe, this is the fight I've looked forward to for a long time.
Your license is about to get revoked.
You come at me and I'm taking your other eye.
Arachnia! We end this today!
That armor won't save you little man.
I'm going to flatten that pointy little head of yours.
Alright Dazzle, show me what you got.
I like you better than Zeus, but I'm still gonna kill ya.
I'll crack you in half!
You can't talk your way out of this one, Invoker.
Juggernaut, when I'm through with you there won't be any of your kind.
Try to keep up, Kunkka.
I'll send you back to hell!
I'll put you down like the dog you are.
Bring as many copies as you want, you're all dead!
It's adorable. You think you can stop me.
Here, piggy, piggy!
I wish I could unsee you, Riki.
I have respect for your ingenuity, Tinker. But I'm still crushing your skull.
Quick question Abaddon: when you say 'Lord of Avernus' is that by birth or by marriage?
Hey Abaddon, I know you got the mist thing down, but can you make clouds?
So you met in jail, huh? I was stuck in solitary.
Listen Ogre, some financial advice? If that little man stiffs you out of any of your money, beat him to death.
Listen ghost, if you're ever gonna ask the Crystal Maiden out on that date, you better start working on those ice puns.
Here's the plan: you freeze 'em, and I'll smash their face in.
So when you say you'll bring an 'end to magic', you don't mean loveable talking monkey royalty right?
Anti-Mage, you need to smile more.
Alright, it's just a suggestion, take it or leave it at your leisure. But maybe you should start talking in the first person?
Arc Warden, you're not planning on sticking me in the moon or anything like that?
I think it's great you commissioned Goodkind to write about you. I mean, people talk about me for free but—good for you.
Axe, you and I are gonna hurt a whole lot of people.
Ya know, nightmare bringing aside, you're a pleasant guy to work with.
You want a good nightmare to torment people? Have 'em trapped inside a rock. It's brutal.
After the battle you mind if I take the bat for a spin?
So, how long have you and the bat been an item?
You like animals. I am an animal. I think you and I are gonna get along just fine.
Ditch the boar, my friend. Primates are where it's at.
Stick with me and you'll find all the blood you need.
Bloodseeker, your work is messy but necessary.
Try to keep up, Gondar!
Scarves are hard to pull off, but it really works on you Bounty Hunter.
Brewmaster, after we kill their Ancient, we are getting loaded.
So how does one become a Brewmaster? Is it hours as an apprentice? An accredited course? Self given title?
When this is all over you, me, and Brewmaster should just get loaded and pick some fights.
Oh, I wish I could have seen that bar fight between you and Tusk.
Let's just get through this Arachnia.
Would it kill you to walk around like how we first met?
. What does it do?
Centaur, you should really climb a tree sometime, you don't know what you're missing
Me, you, and Phantom Lancer should start up an illusory exclusive club.
Nice horse.
Just promise me you won't control me, okay Chen?
Ethically speaking, how are you okay with marching helpless creatures off to their demise?
You mind if I call you Bones? Because whenever I hear Clinkz I start looking for a clockwork creature and I get really confused.
You're a hero Clinkz. Not enough people give you credit for that.
You lock 'em down tin man, I'll take care of the rest
Hey Rylai, you think you could introduce me to Lina?
Alright Maiden, let's have some fun.
You think too much Dark Seer. Try living by instinct sometimes.
A plan is a list of things that don't happen, Dark Seer. Live in the moment.
Dazzle: you keep me alive and I'll keep knockin' em in the dirt.
Alright Shadow Priest, try to keep up!
Prophet, I get that it's your thing, but try not to die, okay?
Lady, you're creeping me out.
Hey Disruptor, you're with me that Zeus is a jerk, right?
Doom, huh? Your mom musta loved you.
. That sounds cozy.
Half dragon, my cloud's in the shop. Can I ride you into battle?
Let me know when you turn into a dragon and kill everyone. I love that part.
Hey Traxex, I don't know what that other archer was talking about, you're not an emotionally vacant husk of perpetual sadness.
I don't want to stick my nose in Ranger business, but that redhead wasn't saying the most kind things about you.
Just stay away from me, Kaolin.
Don't talk to me and we won't have any problems, Earth Spirit.
What's up with the Earth trying to keep guys like us down?
We should start up an 'imprisoned in earth' support group.
So, Elder Titan. You're really old.
Alright, old man Titan, watch and see how it's done.
When this is over we're gonna have a chat about what you did.
You and your brothers are dead to me Xin.
Not gonna lie, Enchantress. Aside from Monkeys, I kind of hate animals.
Enchantress, you are impossibly cheerful.
Enigma, you are one scary force of nature.
Hey Enigma, remember when you tricked that Alchemist? Oh, ha! Good times.
Excuse me, Mr. Void—is the Monkey Kingdom bound by the Clazemere Treaty?
You are an annoying little man in an annoying little plane.
I hate you Gyrocopter.
You and Dazzle should really just have a drink and hug it out.
Huskar, I'm not trying to tell you how to live your life, but getting sacrificed is a bad thing.
I know a thing or two about egomaniacs: and Invoker, you're one of the worst.
We get it Invoker, you're smart. Now can we kill these guys?
Jakiro, Dragon Knight won't play ball. But you'll let me ride you, right?
Glad you're on our side Jakiro.
Juggernaut, is it true you and Templar Assassin used to be a thing?
You gotta show me how to do that lightshow trick, Ezalor.
Keeper, I was thinking next Thursday would be a good day for my 'fundamental ascension' ceremony, that work for you?
Kunkka, I'm not trying to be rude, but you got something on your forehead.
Let's do this Kunkka.
You realize you basically named your Legion 'Third Place', right?
Tresdin, I don't care what armies you've lead. You don't tell me what to do.
Great. Another old guy that throws lightning around.
Just try not to electrocute me, okay Leshrac?
Ya know, for a mage that's cheated death you're... personable?
You don't really warm up to people much, do you Lich?
Lifestealer, is that a family name? Or more of an occupation, like haberdasher?
So, you were in prison a long time. Got any good stories?
Hey Lina, after we win can I buy you a drink?
Soooo Lina. Your sister tell you about me?
Lion, your name is very misleading.
So, Demon Witch, that's a helluva title.
So are you 'Lone Druid' because you're the last druid? Or because you hate hanging out with other Druids?
Sylla; you, me, and that bear of yours are gonna win this battle.
Hey Luna, nice wolf.
We should go on a moonlit walk sometime. You know, after we kill a whole lot of people.
Lycan, you gotta step up your transformation game.
, Lycan.
You are a large man, Magnus.
Hey Magnus, I want to start up a conservation group, you in?
I saw you and Zeus at the Sundered Moon the other night, he's married you know.
So, does your hair ever get tangles? Or does it always just look good?
You're underrated Meepo.
Guys like us gotta stick together, Meepo.
before. Lovely trees.
Try not to get me wet, Morphling.
Morphling, you are a lot more intimidating in person than your name suggests.
You got a helluva voice Siren.
are lucky to have you on their side.
Just don't go moving the trees when I need 'em, Prophet.
Forcing trees to fight goes against their nature, Prophet.
Ugh! Cover your mouth when you cough, Necrophos. You disgust me.
Don't steal my kills and we'll get along just fine.
I guess you're not useless half the time, Night Stalker. That's pretty good.
Do we really have to wait til night to start fighting?
Nyx, I don't wanna see you this battle.
So, do both heads need to eat?
You're lucky you know, one of you can focus on the battle and the other can watch me be fantastic.
You've taken the power, Omniknight. It's yours. Stop kowtowing.
Never tell me the odds.
I can see the future, too, Oracle. It looks like victory.
Just so you know, I have a strict no-Astral-Imprisonment policy.
Stop looking at me like that.
Just admit it, Phantom Assassin, you kill because you like it.
I'm not one of the five names on the list right?
You're a handsome fellow!
It's quite the honor to be mistaken for me.
, Puck? I might like to climb it.
You should become my plucky sidesick, Puck.
Old friend! Oh. I thought you were someone else.
Do me a favor and try not to get pus on me.
Strange bedfellows, huh Pugna?
No, I don't want to see your Nether Ward. Stop asking.
Sorry Akasha, I'm not looking for a Queen.
You and Ostarion would make a helluva power couple.
For someone without a discernible face, Razor, you sure look smug.
Be careful Razor, one day that whip will be turned on you.
Didn't think I'd be seeing you here, Riki.
I'm friends with an alarming amount of assassins.
How about a friendly duel, Rubick? I've heard some things.
Us tricksters need to stick together, eh, Rubick?
Fighting by your side goes against every instinct I have.
I know a fellow you should talk to, Sand King. Fast friends, the two of you.
watching my back. There's a first time for everything.
I'm something of a demon myself, you know.
Keep your hands off my soul and we'll get along just fine.
I'm not afraid to name you friend, Shadow Fiend.
I'm a fan of your work Shaman, a good con is a thing of beauty.
Are your grifting days all behind you, Shadow Shaman?
I'll do the talking, Silencer.
Your voice really carries, Silencer. A bit too much.
this morose? Just you?
Know your problem? Too subservient. Be your own birdman for once.
You're the ugliest thing I've ever seen, Slardar. No offense.
I think I like hanging out with Siren better.
They don't know what it's like inside. Right, Slark?
Careful not to shoot me in the back, Sniper.
Just stay away from my kills, Sniper.
If you need help, Spectre, just shout unintelligibly.
We gotta work on your communication skills, Spectre.
Don't go running off without me, Spirit Breaker.
You're almost crazier than I am, Spirit Breaker.
I've seen Xin and Kaolin. Where's your other brother?
Just make me a damn cloud.
How do you see anything with that helmet on, Sven?
Come on, Sven. Time to drop the hammer on someone!
Wanna spring some traps, Techies?
I'll line 'em up, Techies. You'll know when to press the button.
What happened with you and Juggernaut?
I thought all this Ancients business was beneath you, Lanaya.
Why do you spend so much time in your lesser form, Terrorblade?
I've seen my fair share of demonic brotherhoods. They might have considered you.
Just watch it with the splashing, Tidehunter.
Just jump in there and do your thing, Tidehunter. I'm right behind you.
We talked about this, Timbersaw. No clearcutting!
If I can't leap to the fight, Timbersaw, you know who to blame.
So Tinker, was it head trauma that made you dream all that up?
I can appreciate a man unconstrained by what the world tells him's possible.
So Tiny's just a not-so-clever name then.
We've actually got something in common, Tiny. What kind of stone are you?
The trees respect you, Treant, but they love me.
Yes, yes, Treant. I remember. No climbing.
I didn't think you went in for team sports, Troll.
My friend Breklin is a big fan of your work, Warlord.
Tusk! I like a fellow who does what he says and says what he does.
So, Tusk. What can you tell me about Rylai?
Where we going today, Underlord?
What's the worst place you've accidentally rifted to?
I think there are better ways to do it, Undying, but to each his own.
Undying? Yeah, me too.
Ursa! I welcome you to my fight.
The world needs more bears like you, Ursa.
I'm with you - I like making people pay for what they did too.
I like a lady that goes after what she wants.
You should visit my Kingdom sometime.
Just try not to spit on me, ok?
You're not exciting, Viper, but you sure get the job done.
You're Viper? Don't look like one to me.
Send your birds aloft, Visage. Let's find some prey.
Can I borrow that book when you're done with it, Warlock?
I always did enjoy a good demon story.
No hard feelings, right, Weaver?
Weaver, don't let the bastards keep you down.
You don't fool me, Lyralei. I see the killer behind that smile.
I don't know what Traxex was talking about, you're not completely useless at all.
Tell me, Wyvern, which story about me is your favorite?
Wyvern, my life is poetry.
I like your style, Witch Doctor.
What's in that cask, anyway, Witch Doctor?
We might as well make the best of it, Ostarion.
I'll fight beside you, but I'm not callin' you king, Wraith.
It's no secret I don't like you, Zeus. Well, it isn't a secret now. That didn't go as planned.
It's okay, Zeus. You're one of the good ones. Today.
Not much of a conversationalist, eh, Io?
Don't take this the wrong way, Phoenix, but if one of us has to die, I'd rather it be you.
Ha!
Too easy!
Where's that gold.
Alright.
Don't mind if I do.
I love that sound.
That's right.
Perfect.
Naturally.
Hahaha!
I don't think so.
Nu-uh.
So sorry.
Whoops.
Back off!
Not so fast.
Heh.
Denied!
How's it feel?
Sorry about that.
I'm here all week.
Hm hmm!
Oh yeah.
This is gonna be good.
Earning the money is fun, but spending it is even better.
Time to get back in the fight.
This could change the tide of the fight.
This battle isn't over yet.
Ok, that was unexpected.
Damn it!
I'll come back stronger.
I won't give up.
This isn't the end...
I'll remember this.
I'll make you pay for this!
No!
Impossible!
It can't be!
I was defeated by them?!
That didn't happen!
No one does this to me!
I want a rematch.
This journey isn't over yet.
That won't happen again.
There's still time to win this.
Looks like I'm gonna have to teach people some manners.
No one kills the King and gets away with it.
Good thing I ate those peaches before I came here.
Get it together Wukong.
I just cheated death, you'd think I'd get a little fanfare.
Time to get to work.
Okay, I'll admit it, that was a cute trick. Won't work again though.
A minor setback.
That's a strange feeling.
Nothing will keep me down.
This'll come in handy.
Oh, can't wait to use this.
Mm. I'll use you later.
Things are about to get exciting.
Let's see what this does.
Know what I can do with this?
Oooooo.
Almost.
Not yet.
Wait for it.
Just a little longer.
Need a few more seconds.
All in due time.
I'll be ready in a second.
Don't rush me, when I'm ready I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.
Even I have my limits.
Let me catch my breath first.
I can't do that now.
I'm out of mana.
I need mana.
No mana.
Still need mana.
Aghh!
Ohf!
Uh!
Igh!
Oohf!
Urgh!
Ahhh!
Ooah!
Ehh!
Oooh!
Agh!
Oof!
Urgh!
Dah!
Agh!
Ahh!
Oah!
Argh!
Uh!
Ah!
Ooh!
Aahh!
Ooah!
I never should have sold my likeness and life story.
There's a lot of stories about the Monkey King. Some of 'em are even true.
Where did I park my cloud?
Well, some people ask if I'm really a king. And I always wonder why no one asks if I'm really a monkey.
Top is missing!
Middle is missing!
Bottom is missing!
Of course we won, I'm here.
Oh, too easy!
Hahahahahaaa! Oh!
This'll work.
I can lift a seventeen-thousand pound staff. You think I'm scared of you?
You're not in my league, I get it. But try to keep up.
